headline: Aristotle Capital Exited Xylem (XYL) Despite Its Potential and Long-Term Catalysts. Here’s Why
summary: Aristotle Capital Management, LLC, an investment management company, released its “Value Equity Strategy” second quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Although the U.S. equity market started with volatility in the second quarter, it rebounded with strength, with the S&P 500 Index rising 10.94% during the quarter. The composite returned 4.88% […]
